articles.image_title: CANADA - NOVEMBER 27: New Entrant in Millar Will Stork Derby has had 16 children. Mrs. Arthur Hollis Timleck; 14 Sumach St.; Toronto; who claims to have given birth to 16 children; nine of them born since Oct.; 1926; today entered the Charles Vance Millar stork marathon; and announce that she would apply for the half million dollars which; under the late Mr. Millar's will; is to be awarded to the Toronto mother who has given birth to the greatest number of children in the ten years following the barrister's death.
